TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PageLayoutCollection extends Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.QueryBasedCollection`1<class Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.PageLayout>
Public Class PageLayoutCollection Inherits QueryBasedCollection(Of PageLayout)

Docs.summary: Creates a collection of PageLayout objects.

remarks.para: This collection provides integer, string, and GUID indexer methods and supports foreach enumeration (For Each in Visual Basic) and a Count property that you can use when explicitly iterating over the collection. The PageLayoutCollection can be retrieved from methods such as , , and .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.PageLayout Add(string pageLayoutName, valuetype Microsoft.SharePoint.SPContentTypeId associatedContentTypeId) cil managed
Public Function Add (pageLayoutName As String, associatedContentTypeId As SPContentTypeId) As PageLayout

Docs.param: Identifier (ID) of the SPContentType that this PageLayout will be associated with.
Docs.summary: Creates and adds a new PageLayout object.

remarks.para: The parameter can either have no file name extension or an .aspx extension. The value must not be empty and cannot exceed 128 characters. The name must also be unique within the master page gallery of the SPSite.RootWeb site. The value cannot contain any of the following invalid characters:, ", #, %, *, :, <, >, ?, \, /, {, |, } or an ampersand or ASCII character 0x7f. The value must identify a valid SPContentType on the SPSite.RootWeb site.

Docs.exception: The File or folder name "%1" contains characters that are not permitted. Please use a different name.

The specified file or folder name is too long. The URL path for all files and folders must be 260 characters or less (and no more than 128 characters for any single file or folder name in the URL). Please type a shorter file or folder name.
Indicates that one of the input parameters is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
The current user does not have sufficient permissions to perform this action.
Indicates that another file with the same name already exists.
Indicates a problem with the parameter.

Docs.param: Name of the PageLayout to search for.
SPFolder to search within for the PageLayout.
Docs.summary: Determines whether a PageLayout object with a specific name exists in the specified SPFolder object.
Docs.returns: true if a PageLayout with a specific name is found within the specified SPFolder; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: The parameter must not be empty and must be a string that is not null. The parameter must not be null.

Docs.summary: Gets the default file name extension for PageLayout objects.
Docs.value: A String that represents the default file name extension.

remarks.para: This is set to ".aspx" unless overridden.
